features.name: Custom URL Creation
features.description: Create and manage custom friendly URLs for pages with support for multiple locales and portal aliases
features.ui_location: Admin > Persona Bar > Site Behavior > URL Management > Custom URLs > Add URL
test_scenarios: Create valid custom URL with standard path
Create custom URL with special characters requiring cleaning
Create localized URL for different languages
Attempt to create duplicate URL and verify error handling
Create URL with different status codes (200 Active, 301 Redirect)
Create URL with query string parameters
Create URL for different site aliases
Validate required fields (path, locale, site alias)
Test URL path cleaning and normalization

features.name: Custom URL Deletion
features.description: Delete existing custom URLs from the system
features.ui_location: Admin > Persona Bar > Site Behavior > URL Management > Custom URLs > Delete Action
test_scenarios: Delete URL and verify it's removed from listings
Verify related data cleanup after deletion

features.name: System-Generated URL Management
features.description: View and manage system-generated URLs with sorting and filtering capabilities
features.ui_location: Admin > Persona Bar > Site Behavior > URL Management > System URLs
test_scenarios: Sort URLs by different fields (path, locale, status)
Sort in ascending and descending order
View URL details including site alias and query strings
Verify pagination for large URL lists
Check performance with many system URLs

features.name: Custom URL Listing and Sorting
features.description: View, sort, and manage the list of custom URLs
features.ui_location: Admin > Persona Bar > Site Behavior > URL Management > Custom URLs
test_scenarios: Test ascending and descending sort orders
Verify correct display of URL properties
Test with empty custom URL list

features.name: URL Testing and Generation
features.description: Test URL generation for specific pages with custom parameters and query strings
features.ui_location: Admin > Persona Bar > Site Behavior > URL Management > Test URL
test_scenarios: Test URL generation for existing page
Test special character handling in custom page names
Verify generated URL format and validity

features.name: URL Rewriting Testing
features.description: Test and validate URL rewriting functionality with detailed results
features.ui_location: Admin > Persona Bar > Site Behavior > URL Management > Test Rewriting
test_scenarios: Test URL with complex query strings
Verify rewriting results and status codes
Test malformed URLs for error handling
Test URL rewriting with different portal aliases

features.name: URL Options Configuration
features.description: Retrieve and manage URL management options including locales, status codes, and site aliases
features.ui_location: Admin > Persona Bar > Site Behavior > URL Management > Settings
test_scenarios: Retrieve site aliases and primary alias
Test with single and multi-locale setups

features.name: Site Pages Search
features.description: Search and retrieve site pages for URL management operations
features.ui_location: Admin > Persona Bar > Site Behavior > URL Management > Page Selection
test_scenarios: Search pages by partial text match
Retrieve all pages without search filter
Test with special characters in search

features.name: URL Management Configuration Settings
features.description: Retrieve global URL management configuration including locale settings and sorting options
features.ui_location: Admin > Persona Bar > Site Behavior > URL Management > Configuration
test_scenarios: Test configuration with different portal settings

features.name: URL Management UI Navigation
features.description: Basic UI structure and navigation for URL management module
features.ui_location: Admin > Persona Bar > Site Behavior > URL Management
